title: ID: text typeface for Boost Mobile?
content:
Does anyone know what typeface the text on the Boost Mobile website is?

[http://www.boostmobile.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183014/http:/www.boostmobile.com/ "http://www.boostmobile.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183014im_/http:/typophile.com/files/boost_mobile_textface2_5129.jpg)

Thanks!
author: lapetino

comments.content:
Commissionned typeface for BoostMobile called [BoostNeo Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183014/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45009).  
 [Yves suggested some alternatives](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183014/http:/typophile.com/node/48925): Alias Type [Enabler](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183014/http:/www.alias.uk.com/_font_enabler.html) and [Progress](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183014/http:/www.alias.uk.com/progress_frameset.html) by Gareth Hague
Thanks so much for your help!
